attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If anyone wants to live and work here,thats fine.But please live as the British do.If you want to live here abide by British rules.If you have no work please dont expext any hand outs.We the British public can't keep putting are hands into our pockets to keep people who do not want to work.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
